methods.name: removeAtIndex
methods.description: Remove file located at specific index in the model
methods.description_zh: 删除位于模型中特定索引处的文件

methods.name: removeFile
methods.description: Remove specified file from the model
methods.description_zh: 从模型中删除指定文件

methods.name: getNativeElement
methods.description: DEPRECATED; Access 'nativeEl' directly; Gets the native input DOM Element
methods.description_zh: 荒废的;直接访问“nativeEl”;获取本机输入 DOM 元素

model-value.desc: Model of the component; Must be FileList or Array if using 'multiple' prop; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

append.description: Append file(s) to current model rather than replacing them; Has effect only when using 'multiple' mode
append.description_zh: 将文件追加到当前模型，而不是替换它们;仅在使用“多重”模式时有效

display-value.description: Override default selection string, if not using 'file' or 'selected' scoped slots and if not using 'use-chips' prop
display-value.description_zh: 覆盖默认选择字符串，如果不使用“file”或“selected”范围插槽，如果不使用“use-chips”属性

use-chips.description: Use QChip to show picked files
use-chips.description_zh: 使用 QChip 显示选取的文件

counter-label.description: Label for the counter; The 'counter' prop is necessary to enable this one
counter-label.description_zh: 计数器标签;“counter”道具是启用此功能所必需的

input-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the underlying selection container
input-class.description_zh: 要归因于基础选择容器的类定义

input-style.description: Style definitions to be attributed to the underlying selection container
input-style.description_zh: 要归因于基础选择容器的样式定义
